'''Minecraft Annual 2022''' is a ''Minecraft'' book authored by [[Mojang AB]] and [[Farshore Books]].

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|The official ''Minecraft'' Annual 2022 is packed with activities, build ideas and [[survival]] challenges to try out in-game.
<br>
Featuring all the latest news in the world of ''Minecraft'', the official ''Minecraft'' Annual is a must have for all ''Minecraft'' fans. Discover the latest updates and the newest games, including features on the [[Caves & Cliffs|Cliffs and Caves]] update, ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]'' and ''[[Minecraft Earth]]''.|Book description<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.amazon.com/Minecraft-Annual-2022-Mojang-AB/dp/0755501071/|title=Minecraft Annual 2022: The New Official Guide Book for the Bestselling Video Game of All Time packed with Activities and Builds for Kids|author=Mojang Studios|website=Amazon|archive=1}}</ref>}}
